welcome_message_body: Welcome to Dartford, a charming town known for its rich history and beautiful landscapes. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that this city has to offer. Have a wonderful stay!

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Rochester Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Redhill Aerodrome serves both commercial and private flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Southend Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Satellite Terminal
terminals.description: The satellite terminal at Southend Airport is used for overflow and seasonal flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the terminal.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest terminal at Heathrow, serving mostly domestic and European flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The newest terminal at Heathrow, serving mainly international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The busiest terminal at Heathrow, serving a mix of domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Heathrow, serving mainly long-haul flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 5
terminals.description: The largest terminal at Heathrow, serving mainly British Airways flights.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport, but a premium option is also available for faster speeds.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Stansted Airport handles both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Satellite Terminal
terminals.description: The satellite terminal at Stansted Airport is primarily used for low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
